What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cascade into Fling

What is the expected output?
Ask to pay additional cost of sacrificing a creature. 

What do you see instead?
Not asked, program crashes as Fling expects a creature to be referenced in the cost
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: when casting card without their mana cost, mandatory additional costs must still be paid

comments.body: optional costs such as kicker may be paid when casting without paying mana cost
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Ah yes, I forgot that - happened to me with Isochron Scepter and Shrapnel Blast as well - I wasn't asked to sacrifce an artifact.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body:
One more thing: if spells are casted without paying their mana cost, alternative costs are disregarded. Additional costs, though may be paid - mandatory additional cost must be paid.

e.g.: Violent Outburst cascades into Vines of Vastwood, you should be propted to pay the kicker cost. Same when imprinting Vines of Vastwood onto Isocrone Scepter and casting a copy of the spell from there.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body:
... same goes for Replicate, which is an addition cost, too

702.55a Replicate is a keyword that represents two abilities. The first is a static ability that functions while the spell is on the stack. The second is a triggered ability that functions while the spell is on the stack. “Replicate [cost]” means “As an additional cost to play this spell, you may pay [cost] any number of times” and “When you cast this spell, if a replicate cost was paid for it, copy it for each time its replicate cost was paid. If the spell has any targets, you may choose new targets for any number of the copies.”
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
